review: the future of television!  works great, love the original features..sometimes takes long to find a movie than to watch one
author: Bill Crossman

review: Works great. Speaking to the remote to perform the action I requested usually works well. Every once in a while it comes up with some crazy response but it is not really a problem. Almost no buffering at all. Picture quality is great as well. I have only had to reboot the unit twice when the audio started to sound strange but, with the reboot, it fixed that issue.
author: Phillip J. Reed

review: Love the voice feature when searching for all sorts of media data.  No keyboard needed for this unit.  This alone makes it a stand out searching device.
author: Robert Schreiber "Web Designer"

review: I love everything about Amazon except this product. Can't get it to find my wifi. Everything else in the house can find my wifi but not this Fire TV box. Sorry.
author: Elsie85

review: The responsiveness compared to a wifi connected dvd player is amazing.  It loads instantly and plays without pauses.  One can also scan the wathchlist much quicker.
author: James C. Fitzpatrick

review: so far have been able to see a variety of tv shows and movies that I never thought existed. Am very happy with this amazon fire tv.
author: Louie

review: This was  a gift, a total surprise, but I am loving it. Able to watch on a large screen has been great and I can share the shows I am watching with my family
author: djl

review: The ease of use is very important to me and you do make it simple.  Picture quality is not changed with Amazon Fire TV.
author: David Hays

review: I traded this in for my year-old Apple Tv. There is no comparison. The Fire TV is more reliable, never loses network connection, is faster, has a cleaner interface, and the voice search is indispensable. I'm so excited about finally having a reliable device to catch up on movies and tv shows.
author: S. Burgess

review: Love the voice search on this.  Everything has worked great and I love being able to mirror it with my Fire HDX!  Awesome unit!!!
